TopicTitle: [WIP] ShipEffects Sound Mod (Dynamic Ship Sound Effects) - NOW RELEASED

Articles.Content:
**shipEffects Sound Mod** - Work in Progress

Dynamic Sound Effects

UPDATE: Now In release version! Go to the new thread:https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/114618-0-90-shipEffects-Sound-Mod-Dynamic-IVA-Sound-Effects-v0-1?p=1817770#post1817770[**http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/114618-0-90-shipEffects-Sound-Mod-Dynamic-IVA-Sound-Effects-v0-1**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/114618-0-90-shipEffects-Sound-Mod-Dynamic-IVA-Sound-Effects-v0-1)

Hello! I'm a new lad in the forums, for weeks I've been reading pizzaoverhead's thread [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/55227-Kerbal-Sound-Overhaul-Project](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/55227-Kerbal-Sound-Overhaul-Project) . And I was eagerly waiting for someone to step up and do the interior dynamic sound effects "ship stress sounds due to g-force, creates creaks, rattles, vibrations and alike"

I couldn't wait so I did it myself. I'm a newbie programmer but with a little bit of reading and reference I figure'd it out. It works by using the gforce data and converting that to be a usable dynamic volume control.

Currently working on some sound assets and mainly focused in IVA.

**UPDATE(04.02.15):**

Finished editing and creating the sound assets! Going to work on the plugin now and will rewrite it as well.

Here's a video demo:

[http://youtu.be/mYwNFhj0wyo](https://youtu.be/mYwNFhj0wyo)

Best experience if combined with these mods: KerbQuake, Atmospheric Sound Enhancement, CollisionFX and FAR/NEAR(MORE GFORCE YAY!)

If someone could help me with the programming, that'd be great! It'll enable me to focus more on the soundeffects sampling myself.
